verses.verse: Then <S%H347>Job<s%> <S%H6030>answered<s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%>
I have <S%H8085>heard<s%> <S%H7227>many<s%> such <S%H428>things:<s%> <S%H5999>miserable<s%> <S%H5162>comforters<s%> are ye <S%H3605>all.<s%>
Shall <S%H7307>vain<s%> <S%H1697>words<s%> have an <S%H7093>end?<s%> <S%H176>or<s%> <S%H4100>what<s%> <S%H4834>emboldeneth<s%> thee <S%H3588>that<s%> thou <S%H6030>answerest?<s%>

I <S%H595><s%> <S%H1571>also<s%> could <S%H1696>speak<s%> as ye do: <S%H3863>if<s%> your <S%H5315>soul<s%> <S%H3426>were<s%> in my soul's <S%H8478>stead,<s%> <S%H5315><s%> I could heap <S%H2266>up<s%> <S%H4405>words<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> you, and <S%H5128>shake<s%> <S%H1119>mine<s%> <S%H7218>head<s%> <S%H5921>at<s%> you.
But I would <S%H553>strengthen<s%> you <S%H1119>with<s%> my <S%H6310>mouth,<s%> and the <S%H5205>moving<s%> of my <S%H8193>lips<s%> should <S%H2820>assuage<s%> your grief.
Though <S%H518><s%> I <S%H1696>speak,<s%> my <S%H3511>grief<s%> is <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H2820>assuaged:<s%> and though I <S%H2308>forbear,<s%> <S%H4100>what<s%> <S%H4480><s%> am I <S%H1980>eased?<s%>
But <S%H389><s%> <S%H6258>now<s%> he hath made me <S%H3811>weary:<s%> thou hast made <S%H8074>desolate<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> my <S%H5712>company.<s%>

And thou hast filled me with <S%H7059>wrath,<s%> which <S%H1961>is<s%> a <S%H5707>witness<s%> against me: and my <S%H3585>leanness<s%> rising <S%H6965>up<s%> in me beareth <S%H6030>witness<s%> to my <S%H6440>face.<s%>

He <S%H2963>teareth<s%> me in his <S%H639>wrath,<s%> who <S%H7852>hateth<s%> me: he <S%H2786>gnasheth<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> me with his <S%H8127>teeth;<s%> mine <S%H6862>enemy<s%> <S%H3913>sharpeneth<s%> his <S%H5869>eyes<s%> upon me.

They have <S%H6473>gaped<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> me with their <S%H6310>mouth;<s%> they have <S%H5221>smitten<s%> me upon the <S%H3895>cheek<s%> <S%H2781>reproachfully;<s%> they have gathered <S%H4390>themselves<s%> <S%H3162>together<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> me.
God <S%H410><s%> hath <S%H5462>delivered<s%> me <S%H413>to<s%> the <S%H5760>ungodly,<s%> and turned me <S%H3399>over<s%> <S%H5921>into<s%> the <S%H3027>hands<s%> of the <S%H7563>wicked.<s%>

I <S%H1961>was<s%> at <S%H7961>ease,<s%> but he hath broken me <S%H6565>asunder:<s%> he hath also <S%H270>taken<s%> me by my <S%H6203>neck,<s%> and shaken me to <S%H6327>pieces,<s%> and set me <S%H6965>up<s%> for his <S%H4307>mark.<s%>

His <S%H7228>archers<s%> compass me round <S%H5437>about,<s%> <S%H5921><s%> he <S%H6398>cleaveth<s%> my <S%H3629>reins<s%> asunder, and doth <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H2550>spare;<s%> he poureth <S%H8210>out<s%> my <S%H4845>gall<s%> upon the <S%H776>ground.<s%>
He <S%H6555>breaketh<s%> me with <S%H6556>breach<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> <S%H6440><s%> <S%H6556>breach,<s%> he <S%H7323>runneth<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> me like a <S%H1368>giant.<s%>
I have <S%H8609>sewed<s%> <S%H8242>sackcloth<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> my <S%H1539>skin,<s%> and <S%H5953>defiled<s%> my <S%H7161>horn<s%> in the <S%H6083>dust.<s%>
My <S%H6440>face<s%> is <S%H2560>foul<s%> <S%H4480>with<s%> <S%H1065>weeping,<s%> and <S%H5921>on<s%> my <S%H6079>eyelids<s%> is the shadow of <S%H6757>death;<s%>
Not <S%H3808><s%> <S%H5921>for<s%> any <S%H2555>injustice<s%> in mine <S%H3709>hands:<s%> also my <S%H8605>prayer<s%> is <S%H2134>pure.<s%>
O <S%H776>earth,<s%> <S%H3680>cover<s%> <S%H408>not<s%> thou my <S%H1818>blood,<s%> and let my <S%H2201>cry<s%> <S%H1961>have<s%> <S%H408>no<s%> <S%H4725>place.<s%>
Also <S%H1571><s%> <S%H6258>now,<s%> <S%H2009>behold,<s%> my <S%H5707>witness<s%> is in <S%H8064>heaven,<s%> and my <S%H7717>record<s%> is on <S%H4791>high.<s%>
My <S%H7453>friends<s%> <S%H3887>scorn<s%> me: but mine <S%H5869>eye<s%> poureth <S%H1811>out<s%> tears <S%H413>unto<s%> <S%H433>God.<s%>
O that one might <S%H3198>plead<s%> for a <S%H1397>man<s%> <S%H5973>with<s%> <S%H433>God,<s%> as a <S%H1121>man<s%> <S%H120><s%> pleadeth for his <S%H7453>neighbor!<s%>
When <S%H3588><s%> a <S%H4557>few<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> are <S%H857>come,<s%> then I shall <S%H1980>go<s%> the <S%H734>way<s%> whence I shall <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H7725>return.<s%>
